greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of one-sided strictly non-overlapping holeless polyhexes of perimeter 2n, counted up to rotation.
comment: For n >= 1, a(n) gives the total number of terms k in A258003 with binary width = 2n + 1, or equally, with A000523(k) = 2n.
formula: Other identities and observations. For all n >= 1:
program: (define (A258204 n) (let loop ((k (+ 1 (expt 2 (+ n n)))) (c 0)) (cond ((pow2? k) c) (else (loop (+ 1 k) (+ c (if (isA258003? k) 1 0)))))))
(define (pow2? n) (let loop ((n n) (i 0)) (cond ((zero? n) #f) ((odd? n) (and (= 1 n) i)) (else (loop (/ n 2) (1+ i)))))) ;; Gives non-false only when n is a power of two.
;; Code for isA258003? given in A258003.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 31 2015
